Uses of Interface
net.jforum.context.SessionContext

  • Packages that use SessionContext 
    Package Description
    net.jforum.context  
    net.jforum.context.standard  
    net.jforum.context.web  

    • Uses of SessionContext in net.jforum.context

      Methods in net.jforum.context that return SessionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SessionContext RequestContext.getSessionContext()
      Returns the current session associated with this request, or if the request does not have a session, creates one.
      SessionContext RequestContext.getSessionContext(boolean create)
      Returns the current HttpSession associated with this request or, if there is no current session and create is true, returns a new session.

    • Uses of SessionContext in net.jforum.context.standard

      Classes in net.jforum.context.standard that implement SessionContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StandardSessionContext
      Session Context non-dependent of HTTP requests
      Methods in net.jforum.context.standard that return SessionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SessionContext StandardRequestContext.getSessionContext() 
      SessionContext StandardRequestContext.getSessionContext(boolean create)
      This method is equal to StandardRequestContext.getSessionContext()

    • Uses of SessionContext in net.jforum.context.web

      Classes in net.jforum.context.web that implement SessionContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WebSessionContext 
      Methods in net.jforum.context.web that return SessionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SessionContext WebRequestContext.getSessionContext() 
      SessionContext WebRequestContext.getSessionContext(boolean create)
